catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 787
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: round basin with low walls, rests on three carved, scrolling feet; red lacquer with black detail; natural woodgrain body
medium: Negoro ware; red and black lacquer with exposed zelkova (keyaki) wood
signed: on bottom, in red: Sanshitsubo; (cyclical date of 1353 or 1413)
title: Wash basin with legs
